title: Using TTY Full Mode on my Pixel 4XL
content:
I have TTY full mode enabled on my Pixel 4XL to try to communicate with a bank that has TTY support. But, for some reason the calls are not going through. I use Google FI as my communications carrier. I don't appear to have RTT mode support on the phone, even though the Android system is version 10.  How do I make my Pixel 4XL work with a business TTY system? 

This is the page I referenced to find out, but it does not answer my question:
https://support.google.com/accessibility/android/answer/9042284
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
